settings.heading: Table & Twine Meal Kit Subscriptions
settings.text: With a dinner meal kit subscription in Charlotte, you can pick from chef-prepared entrées and lighter lunch options without the hassle of eating out.

settings.title: Personalized Subscription
settings.text: Build a personalized Charlotte meal kit to suit your family size and preferences. Add à la carte items like desserts and cocktails to complement any meal.

settings.title: Fresh, Exciting Flavors
settings.text: Each week, our talented culinary team curates a new menu that incorporates seasonal produce and sustainably-sourced proteins.

settings.title: Menu Discounts
settings.text: A weekly meal subscription with Table & Twine affords delicious discounts on chef- inspired dishes.

settings.title: Free, Flexible Delivery
settings.text: With a dinner meal subscription in Charlotte, we’ll deliver pre-prepared ingredients right to your doorstep for free. Or, you can opt for curbside pick-up at one of our local kitchens.
With a dinner meal kit subscription in Charlotte, you can pick from chef-prepared entrées and lighter lunch options without the hassle of eating out.

settings.title: Modify Your Subscription
settings.text: Change your subscription at any time to better accommodate your family’s needs.

settings.title: Swap Meals
settings.text: Up until your order is processed on Sunday morning, you can make adjustments to your meal selections.

settings.title: Skip a Week
settings.text: Going on vacation? With just 2 clicks you can pause your subscription for however long you need.

Unlike other subscription models, Table & Twine allows customers to fully personalize their culinary experience. Modify serving sizes and meal quantities, add à la carte pairings to your meal kit, and make changes up until your order is processed.

settings.title: More Meals
settings.text: Hosting out-of-town guests this week? No problem. With a dinner meal subscription kit in Charlotte, you can add more meals to the same order while taking advantage of your subscription discounts and free delivery.

settings.title: No Renewals
settings.text: The à la carte items you ordered for this upcoming week won’t be included in future orders unless you so choose.

settings.title: Delectable Pairings
settings.text: A great meal is much more than an entrée. That’s why our chefs have curated delicious appetizers and desserts to complement every dish on our rotating menu.

settings.title: Convenient Delivery
settings.text: Your à la carte selections will be delivered with your subscription orders. This allows you to take advantage of free shipping.
